name: Revenge On Ebos
description:
Revenge On Ebos About:

This game was created in one week for the Brackeys 2020.2 game jam.

Story:

Your girlfriend has been brutally murdered by the enemy. Stricken by grief, you travel back in time to wield terrible revenge on the enemy's home planet, Ebos. You'll only rest when their whole civilization is destroyed. HAHAHAHAHA.

You can move with:
  • Controller
  • Keyboard
  • ARROW-Keys
Project Files:

https://github.com/janjcool/Brackeys-GameJam-2020.2
